name: Morpho (tatoyoda600, Lara)
description:
Introduction

Morpho is a 3D platformer where you follow a girl who has awoken in the middle of a forest with no idea how she got there as she attempts to return to civilization with the help of a friendly dragonfly she encounters. Along the way find various powerups in order to overcome the ever more difficult challenges you'll face as you approach the exit.

This is a short game developed for a highschool group project.

Languages

You can choose between English and Spanish in the "Languages" screen on the main menu.
